title.quote: Rent the Montana Cabin in the Giant Mountains and spend an unforgettable vacation with your family or friends.

info.parking: Parking places are right next to the building

details.prgrph1: Cabin Montana is located on the slope of Sachrov ridge in semi-solitude called Horní ves. Montana is located near the ski lifts and close to forests and hiking trails. From Dolní náměstí Rokytnice, a steep road leads to the cabin (approx. 700 m), which is maintained in winter and which is further passable to Horní náměstí and to the Modrá Hvězda ski resort (approx. 1 km).
details.prgrph2: The cabin with four rooms and four bathrooms can comfortably accommodate 13 people. On the lowest floor there is a fully equipped kitchen, which allows full self-catering. There is a refrigerator with freezer, electric stove with oven and dishwasher. The spacious dining room, which also serves as a common room, invites you to sit together and have fun evenings at games with three tables, a large sofa and a fireplace.
details.prgrph3: From the dining room there is a direct exit to the outdoor terrace and garden, where you can grill in summer and build snowmen in winter or ride bobsleigh from the slope. In the early morning hours, shy deer often come to the garden. From the terrace and from the windows of the rooms there is a fascinating view of the valley and the opposite slopes of the Giant Mountains.
details.prgrph4: In the winter season (from December 20 to March 30) it is possible to rent the whole cabin in weekly shifts (from Sunday to Sunday), in other terms it is possible to individually agree on the rental of individual rooms and any number of days.
details.prgrph5: Private parking for two to three cars is located next to the house.
details.prgrph6: In Rokytnice you will find everything you could need. Numerous shopping and dining options are just a few minutes' walk away, and the city also has a pharmacy and several sports equipment rentals.
details.prgrph7: Montana is an perfect starting point for many sports and relaxation activities. The picturesque surroundings offer a large number of trip destinations for the whole family - whether it is short walks, longer hikes or bike trips to the Giant Mountains in summer or cross-country trails and slopes in nearby ski areas (eg Rokytnice nad Jizerou, Studenov, Paseky nad Jizerou, Harrachov) in winter.

tip1.title: Bikepark Rock-it-nice
tip1.info: Bikepark Rokytnice nad Jizerou or Rock it nice uses the slopes of the ski area Horní Domky. There are three tracks with a total length of 7 kilometers, a downhill T-line track for experienced bikers, a freeride trail for the less able and a new Kaprun leading through the forest from the lifts, passable for all. In addition to the cable car, there is a bicycle service, bicycle rental, refreshments and parking.

tip2.title: Sightseeing tour around Rokytnice
tip2.info: Spring, summer and autumn are the ideal times when you can discover the beauty and attractions of Rokytnice nad Jizerou and our highest mountains - the Giant Mountains. The trail will take you through a picturesque landscape with beautiful views of the entire Rokytnice valley. You will learn about its history, natural beauty and cultural attractions. You don't have to go through the whole tour, but you can shorten it anywhere and continue the next day. You can also extend the circuit with other interesting stops at the rock lookout Stráž or at Dvoračky.

pricing.chargeForDog: The fee for a dog is 200 CZK / night.
pricing.dog: Please note that the territory of the village Rokytnice nad Jizerou is part of the Krkonoše National Park (KRNAP) with a defined protection zone and zones of graded nature protection. On the Czech side of the mountains, a leash is not necessary, but you must have a clear control of the dog.
pricing.info1: The cabin is rented as a whole for the above price - the specific price depends on the selected date.
pricing.info2: The price already includes energy consumption.
pricing.info3: The basic clean up at the end of the stay is performed by the client himself.
